variables.name: fType
variables.comment: A String indicating which related data is expected in relatedData.

methods.name: public short getSeverity()
methods.comment: * The severity of the error, either SEVERITY_WARNING, * SEVERITY_ERROR, or SEVERITY_FATAL_ERROR. * * @return A short containing the DOMError severity

methods.name: public DOMLocator getLocation()
methods.comment:
* The location of the DOMError.
     * 
     * @return A DOMLocator object containing the DOMError location.

methods.name: public Object getRelatedException()
methods.comment:
* The related platform dependent exception if any.
     * 
     * @return A java.lang.Exception

methods.name: public String getType()
methods.comment:
* Returns a String indicating which related data is expected in relatedData.
     * 
     * @return A String

methods.name: public Object getRelatedData()
methods.comment:
* The related DOMError.type dependent data if any.
     * 
     * @return java.lang.Object
